pages.text: Different Meat ingredients have different meat values.$(br2)$(l)Foods with meat value of 0.5$()$(br)$(item)Raw Chicken$(), $(item)Cooked Chicken$(), $(br)$(item)Raw Rabbit$(), $(item)Cooked Rabbit$(), $(br)$(item)Raw Cod$(), $(item)Cooked Cod$(), $(br)$(item)Raw Salmon$(), $(item)Cooked Salmon$(), $(br)$(item)Tropical Fish$(), $(item)Pufferfish$(), $(br)$(item)Rotten Flesh$(), $(item)Spider Eye$(), $(br)$(item)Phantom Membrane$()
$(l)Foods with meat value of 1.0$()$(br)$(item)Raw Porkchop$(), $(item)Cooked Porkchop$(), $(br)$(item)Raw Beef$(), $(item)Steak$(), $(br)$(item)Raw Mutton$(), $(item)Cooked Mutton$()
